RenderUI.text:
Use mouse to look around, move using these keys:
W - Move forward S - Move backward A - Move left D - Move right
NumPad 8 - Move camera up NumPad 2 - Move camera down NumPad 4 - Move camera left NumPad 6 - Move camera right
Hold SHIFT - For faster movement Hold CTRL - For slow movement Use mouse wheel for zooming.
To change render options use links in right side or these hot keys:
F1 - Toggle this help box C - Toggle camera mode F - Toggle Edged Faces P - Toggle display points G - Toggle geometry ESC - Close this viewer window
Hold H - For temporarily hide HUD
